    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account()
        No arg constructor defaults to an id and balance of 0. The date is still accurate.

      • Account

        public Account(int idin,
               double balancein)
        Passing an id and balance allows them to be assigned on initial construction. The date is recorded automatically.
        Parameters:
        idin -
        balancein -
